name: You only shoot at 3 o'clock
description:
Shoot at the right time, and make sure the shot counts!

A Puzzle Game, where you can only kill one enemy each round. Kill the right enemy and resolve the standoff.

Controlls:
Mouse:         Hover over a Gunslinger to aim for him.
Click:             Shoot your Target.

Read the next part if you struggle (minor SPOILER):

After the Bell struck 3 times you can shoot.
The Bird is a visual queue for when you can shoot.
Enemies have different behaviours.
Purple: normal Enemy. Green Enemy can shoot 2 targets. Red Enemies switch to another target if you aim for them.
They shoot in the same order as they loaded their gun. Bullets do not pierce sometimes an enemy blocks another. 

made in 48 hours for GMTKJam2019 by one person
